fr.about: Je suis Raghav, un lycéen et un aspirant développeur. Je suis né en Australie, mais je suis indien et j'habite aux états-uni maintenant. J'aime bien la programmation, apprendre des langues, et jouer au geoguessr.

en.about: I'm Raghav a high school student and an aspiring developer. I was born in Australia to Indian parents, and I live in the US now. I enjoy programming, learning languages, and playing geoguessr.

proj.name: Gencord
proj.description: A simple, beginner-friendly, and easy-to-use library for interacting with the Discord API, with minimal syntax.

proj.name: Game of Life
proj.description: An implementation of game of life in python
